title: Award of contract for the construction of 500 houses on design & construction basis for Professionals at Weera Mawatha, Pannipitiya
decision_details: - The Ministry of Megapolis and Western Development has planned to implement a project for the construction of 500 houses for the Professionals at Weera Mawatha, Pannipitiya. This project has been planned to be implemented with the funds obtained as house value in advance from the selected recipients of the houses. Therefore, the proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, the Minister of Megapolis and Western Development,  to implement the project in accordance with the recommendations of the Technical Evaluation Committee and as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
